abstract: The Farm Security Administration sent Jack Delano on a side trip to Puerto Rico. A visit of "a few days" turned into a life's work.
snippet: The Farm Security Administration sent Jack Delano on a side trip to Puerto Rico. A visit of "a few days" turned into a life's work.
lead_paragraph: This is the second of two pieces on the work of Jack Delano. Part One is here.

headline.main: A Masterwork Spanning 40 Years and One Island
